[Home](./index.md) &gt; [firebase-admin](./firebase-admin.md) &gt; [auth](./firebase-admin.auth.md) &gt; [AuthProviderConfigFilter](./firebase-admin.auth.authproviderconfigfilter.md)

## auth.AuthProviderConfigFilter interface

The filter interface used for listing provider configurations. This is used when specifying how to list configured identity providers via .

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface AuthProviderConfigFilter 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [maxResults](./firebase-admin.auth.authproviderconfigfilter.maxresults.md) | number | The maximum number of results to return per page. The default and maximum is 100. |
|  [pageToken](./firebase-admin.auth.authproviderconfigfilter.pagetoken.md) | string | The next page token. When not specified, the lookup starts from the beginning of the list. |
|  [type](./firebase-admin.auth.authproviderconfigfilter.type.md) | 'saml' \| 'oidc' | The Auth provider configuration filter. This can be either <code>saml</code> or <code>oidc</code>. The former is used to look up SAML providers only, while the latter is used for OIDC providers. |
